name: Infinity
tagline: Web Design and Digital Agency, Sydney
description:
Infinity is an Award Winning full services digital agency based in Sydney and have global offices in Brisbane, Perth, China, Hong Kong and Germany. Our core competencies include eCommerce strategy, digital strategy, user experience design, creative design, technical implementation with software platforms such as Magento, Demandware, Intershop and Drupal (Acquia) CMS. 

We have worked with some of the world’s largest brands as well as many mid-sized companies by creating high performance online solutions.
